info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:00PM EDT until September 08 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR HUDSON...SOUTHEASTERN UNION...RICHMOND AND KINGS COUNTIES... At 300 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Port Richmond, or over Bayonne, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth, Bayonne, Linden, Coney Island, Todt Hill, The Verrazano Narrows Bridge, Bay Ridge, Port Richmond, Tompkinsville, Bensonhurst, Oakwood, Annadale, New Dorp, Grasmere, and Heartland Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
